name: Scroll To Top or Bottom
author: shishir

sections.description:
Scroll To Top or Bottom is a lightweight plugin that creates “Scroll to top and Scroll to bottom”
feature in any post/page of your WordPress website.

You can find Live Demo here

fixed bug
sections.installation:
Install via WordPress Admin

  1. Ready the zip file of the plugin

  2. Go to Admin > Plugins > Add New

  3. On the upper portion click the Upload link

  4. Using the file upload field, upload the plugin zip file here and activate the plugin

Install via FTP

  1. First unzip the plugin file

  2. Using FTP go to your server’s wp-content/plugins directory

  3. Upload the unzipped plugin here

  4. Once finished login into your WP Admin and go to Admin > Plugins

  5. Look for “Scroll To Top or Bottom” and activate it
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

You have to instal and activate this plugin. It will then automatically start working in your site.

Can I change the style of the arrows?

Yes you can. There is a png file in the css folder of the ‘Smooth_Scroll_To_Top_or_Bottom’ plugin directory. There you will find a image file named totopicons.png. You can edit this image to change the arrow of the plugin.
